gui.Setup-add-client-pretext: Enter an appmonitor client url to add a new monitor:
gui.Http-details: Http details of the last app monitor request
gui.btn-deleteUrl-confirm:
Are you sure that you want to delete the url

%s

?
gui.msgErr-nocheck-welcome:
Welcome to the Appmonitor Server Webgui!

At the moment it looks very naked because no check was defined yet.
To add an url to check go to the Setup.
gui.msgErr-nodata: ERROR: Sorry, no response from any website. See Tab Overview for details.
gui.msgErr-missedchecks: ERROR: %d check(s) failed. The view is incomplete. See Tab Checks for details.
gui.msgErr-demosite: This is a demo website. Changing the config is not possible here.
gui.msgErr-Http-request-failed: Http Request to appmonitor failed: host or service is unreachable.
gui.msgErr-Http-error: Http response header is not a 2xx code.
gui.msgErr-Http-no-jsondata: Server response does not contain json data.
gui.msgErr-Url-not-added-no-appmonitor: URL not added: %s - it does not seems to be an app monitor url.
gui.msgErr-Url-not-removed-it-does-not-exist: URL cannot be removed - it doees not exist in the config: %s.
gui.zzz_lastentry: This is just a Dummy entry without comma at the end of line

notifications.changetype-0.email.subject: Webapp has no change: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-1.logmessage: Webapp was added to the appmonitor: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-1.email.subject: ADDED in appmonitor: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-1.email.message: The webapp __URL__ was added in the appmonitor. From now on you will get notifications if the status changes.
notifications.changetype-2.logmessage: Status of __URL__ has changed from __LAST-RESULT__ to __RESULT__.
notifications.changetype-2.email.subject: __CHANGE__ __LAST-RESULT__ --> __RESULT__ :: App monitor __URL__
notifications.changetype-2.email.message: Status of __URL__ has changed from __LAST-RESULT__ to __RESULT__.
notifications.changetype-3.email.subject: DELETED in appmonitor: __URL__.
notifications.changetype-3.email.message: The webapp __URL__ was deleted in the appmonitor. If this is an error, then contact the sysadmin.
